propertyFields.name: id?
propertyFields.description: An identification string which will be generated on its creation

propertyFields.name: type
propertyFields.description: Action's type, e.g. STORE, EMAIL, etc

propertyFields.name: name
propertyFields.description: Unique name, used for its identification

propertyFields.name: state
propertyFields.description: Identifies the action's current state, that is, if it's currently enabled or disabled

propertyFields.name: description
propertyFields.description: Brief description of the action, e.g. explaining what it will be used for

propertyFields.name: properties
propertyFields.description: Action specific key-value pairs describing configuration properties

propertyFields.name: fallbackAction?
propertyFields.description: Action to fallback to if execution of current action fails

propertyFields.name: fallbackTime?
propertyFields.description: Time in seconds to allow the current action to be retried before executing the fallback action. If 0, undefined or null the action will be retried for its maximum times and if still fails, then the fallback action will be executed

propertyFields.name: labels?
propertyFields.description: Representing meaningful identifiers, which enable custom displaying & filtering capabilities
